name: TDoV Museum
description:
MUSIC NOTE: if you'd rather listen to a playlist of queer artists, mute this tab and click HERE.

Functional (but not recommended) on some mobile devices.

If you'd like to play a text-based version of this built in Twine, click HERE.

This project was made for the Rainbow Lounge and the LGBTQ+ community of MIT, to celebrate Trans Day of Visibility 2020.

Credits:

  • S. Ayala - Museum Designer and Builder (meaning: art assets, writing, everything clickable and playable)
  • Lauryn McNair - Assistant Director of Intercultural Engagement for LBGTQ+ Services
  • Created in Flicksy (by mark wonnacott / candle)
  • Background music is "8 Bit Music" by Alexander Blu

Thank you for visiting!
